name: Seirai Island
title: Seirai Island
desc: "The great battle where the sea and sky changed color have become lost to time, but the vast storms that were called upon at this time still remain."

skills.desc:
After any character on either side is healed: That character gains Distant Storm. (Takes 2 Piercing DMG at the End Phase. Can be used once)
Duration (Rounds): 2
